ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Model_Infinite_Bag
ObjectStates.Description: Put your Builders in the bag and score (number of Builders + Fakir cards, if any) x number of Blue valued Tiles surrounding your final Tile, including that Tile, if Blue valued.

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Model_Infinite_Bag
ObjectStates.Description: Put your Assassins in the bag and Kill 1 Meeple (number of Assassins + Fakir cards, if any) Tiles away (if this empties the Tile, place one of your Camels on it) OR Kill 1 Meeple in front of one of your opponents.

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Model_Infinite_Bag
ObjectStates.Description: Place all the Purple Meeples you just collected in front of you and take a matching number of Item Markers from the pile. Choose one of them, keep it face down before you, and discard the others face up. Each Item will be worth some VPs at Game End, except for Magic Items that have a special effect. At the end of the game, each Artisan gives you 3 VPs if no other player has more Artisans than you; otherwise you score only 2 VPs per Artisan. Artisans can also be spent in the Workshops during the game to acquire more Items.

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Model
ContainedObjects.Description: Place all the Purple Meeples you just collected in front of you and take a matching number of Item Markers from the pile. Choose one of them, keep it face down before you, and discard the others face up. Each Item will be worth some VPs at Game End, except for Magic Items that have a special effect. At the end of the game, each Artisan gives you 3 VPs if no other player has more Artisans than you; otherwise you score only 2 VPs per Artisan. Artisans can also be spent in the Workshops during the game to acquire more Items.

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Tile
ObjectStates.Description: The Chasm is a forbidden, impassable Tile. There can never be any Meeple on it, neither during setup, nor during gameplay.

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Tile
ObjectStates.Description: The Great Lake is a forbidden, impassable tile. There can never be any meeples on it, during setup or during gameplay. At the end of the game, each Palace or Palm Tree on a tile adjacent to the Great Lake tile (either orthogonally or diagonally) is worth twice the amount of points it would normally bring (10 for a Palace, 6 for a Palm Tree).

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Tile
ObjectStates.Description: When you end your move on a Fabulous City, add the Whim of the Sultan card to your hand if thereâ€™s one on the tile. If there is no card on the city, you get no extra bonus. At the end of the game, each Fabulous City tile is worth 5 times the number of Fabulous Cities you control. Read the full rules for more details.

ObjectStates.Name: Card
ObjectStates.Description: Each time a player other than you ends their movement on a market space, you draw the first card from the resource deck.

ObjectStates.Name: Card
ObjectStates.Description: Every other player discards 1 precious or magic Item face up. You take 1 Item of your choice from among these and place it face down in front of you.

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Model
ObjectStates.Description: (Magic Item) Select a Tile. You can move up to 5 meeples of any color(s), from any adjacent Tile(s), onto this Tile. This does not allow you to take control of these Tiles.

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Model
ObjectStates.Description: (Magic Item) Take a Djinn among the available ones, or reveal and take the first Djinn of the Djinn deck.

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Model

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Model

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Model
ObjectStates.Description: (Magic Item) Refill the row of Resource cards to 9 cards, then re-organize these cards in the order of your choice.

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Model
ObjectStates.Description: (Magic Item) When performing the "Move Meeples" phase, you may drop the last Meeple on any Tile of the board (except the one where you dropped the second to last Meeple). You must still respect the Last Meeple Same Color rule. The Flying Carpet also allows to ignore Mountains.

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Model
ObjectStates.Description: (Magic Item) Remove two Meeples of any color(s) from a Tile of your choice. If you completely empty a new Tile out of ALL its Meeples, and if it is not already owned by an opponent, you immediately gain control of that Tile: place one of your Camels on it to show your ownership. Does not count as Killing.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Collect 10 GC if you control a Workshop tile.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Collect 15 GC if you own at least 3 precious items no matter if they are identical or not. Show the items, but donâ€™t discard them.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Reveal this card when you kill a Purple Artisan and collect 5 GC.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Your Elders, Viziers and Artisans are protected from Assassins.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: At game end, each Vizier you hold is worth 3 VPs instead of 1.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Each time a Meeple is dropped on one of your Tiles during a Move, collect 1 GC if you did the Move; 2 GCs if one of your opponents did.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Cost 1 Elder or 1 Fakir, Place 1 Palace on any Village.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Each time someone gets a Djinn, collect 1 GC if itâ€™s you, 2 GCs if itâ€™s an opponent.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Cost 1 Elder or 1 Fakir, When placing a Palace, you may drop it on any neighboring Tile instead.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Cost 1 Elder or 1 Fakir, When building a Palm Tree, you may place it on a neighboring Tile instead.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Cost 1 Elder or 1 Fakir, Your Assassins kill 2 Meeples of any color on the same Tile or kill 2 Elders and/or Viziers from the same opponent.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Cost 1 Elder or 1 Fakir, Place 1 Palm Tree on any Oasis.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Cost 1 Fakir, Take the top card from the Resource pile.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Each time Assassins kill Meeple(s), collect 1 GC if you did the Killing; 2 GCs if an opponent did.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: At game end, each of your Palm Trees is worth 5 VPs instead of 3.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Cost 1 Elder + (1 Elder or 1 Fakir), Take control of 1 empty Tile (no Camel, Meeple, Palm Tree or Palace); place 1 of your Camels on it.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
Each time your Assassins kill a:
Merchant - draw the first Resource card from the row of Resources
Builder - take the GCs that Builder would have taken
Artisan - place it in front of you and take the first Item from the Item pile
Vizier or Elder - place it in front of you instead of killing it

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Cost 1 or more Fakir(s), When bidding for Turn Order, for each Fakir you discard your bidding cost is reduced by 1 spot.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: At game end, each pair of Fakirs you hold acts as 1 Wild Merchandise of your choice.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Cost 1 Elder or 1 Fakir, Choose an empty Tile (with no Camel, Meeple, Palm Tree or Palace). Place 3 Meeples on that tile (drawn at random from the bag).

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Cost 1 Elder + (1 Elder or 1 Fakir), Draw the top 3 Djinns from the top of the Djinns pile; keep 1, discard the 2 others.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Cost 1 Elder + (1 Elder or 1 Fakir), Double the amount of GCs your Builders get this turn.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Each time a Palace is placed, collect 1 GC if you did it; 2 GCs if your opponents did.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: At game end, each of your Elders is worth 4 VPs instead of 2.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Cost 1 Elder + (1 Elder or 1 Fakir), Take control of 1 Tile with only Meeples on it (no Camel, Whim Card, Palm Tree or Palace); place 1 of your Camels on it.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Every other player discards 1 Vizier. You take 1 Vizier from among these and place it in front of you.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Every other player discards 1 Djinn of their choice. You take 1 Djinn of your choice from among these and place it in front of you.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Every other player discards 1 Palm Tree or 1 Palace on a Tile they control. You take 1 Palm Tree or 1 Palace among these and place it on a Tile that you control (even on a Tile that is not an Oasis or a Village).

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Every other player discards 2 Resource cards of their choice face up. You take 2 cards of your choice from among these and add them to your hand.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Every other player chooses 1 tile that he controls and takes back the Camel that is on it. You take control of 1 tile from among these by placing 1 of your Camels on it.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Collect 10 GC if you own 2 copies of the Pottery Resource card. Show the cards, but donâ€™t discard them.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Collect 10 GC if you own 2 copies of the Wheat Resource card. Show the cards, but donâ€™t discard them.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Collect 10 GC if you own 2 copies of the Fish Resource card. Show the cards, but donâ€™t discard them.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Collect 15 GC if you control at least one small market tile and one large market tile.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Collect 15 GC if you control 3 adjacent tiles (aligned either vertically or horizontally).

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Collect 10 GC if you control any of the 4 corner tiles of the board.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Collect 15 GC if you control at least 3 Djinns.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Collect 10 GC if you own 4 Yellow Viziers.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Collect 10 GC if you own 3 White Elders.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Collect 15 GC if you control at least 2 Sacred Places tiles.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Collect 10 GC if there are at least 2 Palaces on tiles you control.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Collect 10 GC if there are at least 2 Palm Trees on tiles you control.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Collect 10 GC if you validated at least 2 Whim of the Sultan Cards (not counting this one).

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Reveal this card when you perform a Buildersâ€™ tribe action which is worth at least 15 GC and collect 15 GC.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Reveal this card when you kill a Yellow Vizier and collect 5 GC.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Reveal this card when you kill a White Elder and collect 5 GC.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Reveal this card when you kill a Blue Builder and collect 5 GC.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Reveal this card when you kill a Green Merchant and collect 5 GC.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Reveal this card when you kill a Red Assassins and collect 10 GC.
